reference.shortdesc: Use the mathml element to indicate content that is part of a mathematical equation, such as elements from the MathML standard, references to MathML elements held in separate, non-DITA documents, data, or data-about elements.

section.title: Usage Information
section.p: The mathml element is not intended to represent acomplete semantic equation, only content that is part of a semantic equation. Use the equation domain elements or their equivalent to represent equations semantically, for example, to enable numbering of equations.
The MathML markup must have a root element of math within the MathML namespace: "http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML".

section.title: Inheritance
section.p: The mathml element is specialized from foreign. It is defined in the mathml-domain module.
